title: I am planning to buy Airtel Xstream Fiber at 300 Mbps speed. What speed will I actually get? On what factors does it depend? - Quora

response.answer_text: Go for it. It's worth, also they have plan to change the plan to unlimited which will take care of all your needs. Airtel is lot better in every aspect if you compare it to other services provider like Jio. The factor is seamless service to retain customers and their feedback suggestions to their friends and family (word of mouth) to subscribe for the same service. Plus you get Airtel OTT, NETFLIX and AMAZON PRIME.
